
# Test comprovació continguts unitat

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

```{r testquiz, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, cache=FALSE}
library(yaml)
library(rjson)
htmltools::includeHTML("quizzesTasques/html/header.html")
a <- read_yaml(file="quizzesTasques/quizyaml/quiz1.yml")  # read Quiz yaml
b <- toJSON(a)                                     # convert to JSON
CON <- file("quizzesTasques/quizjs/test.js")              # Write to .js
writeLines(c('var quizJSON = ',b,';'),CON, sep="")
close(CON)

htmltools::includeHTML("quizzesTasques/html/body.html")   # insert quiz body
```
